description:
Everyone is too busy to spar with Goku, so he seeks out Krillin for old times’ sake. Disappointed in his current combat ability, Krillin decides that he’s in dire need of retraining.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku and Krillin: Back to the Old Training Grounds
Goku e Kuririn: De volta para o antigo campo de treinamento
Goku und Krillin! - Das Training an alter Stätte!
Gokuu to Krillin: Natsukashi no Shugyou no Ba e
悟空とクリリン 懐かしの修行の場へ
